actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1976 for carrying out title VI of the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations of $5,000,000,000 for fiscal year 1976 for carrying out the programs authorized under the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act, including (1) comprehensive manpower services, (2) public employment programs, and (3) Job Corps.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1976 for carrying out title VI of the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973.
